There are two reasons. One is that my dad is visiting and I have to 
show him around town and stuff so I hardly have any time to be on the 
computer at all, much less update the site, and two is that I still 
need to write them.

::The Galactors::

Both jets turned, flying away from the base as fast as the could. The 
Vycir/Slasys jet managed to evade the four EMP blasts, spinning 
wildly in the air to do so. It turns, firing three more shots at the 
shields.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing that the missiles wern't working, the Supernova/Scrap/Flare 
jet activates its one non-explosive weapon, firing one large plasma 
shot at the shields of the base.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>       Yan, is there a reason the Galactors arent on the site?
> 
> 
>        Tarantulas sees the jets coming on his viewscreen. The radar 
picks up 
> the missles shot by Supernove instantly and responded with four 
quick laser 
> blasts from the turrets. The missles exploded before reaching the 
shield, 
> sending debris flying this way and that.
>        The Vycir/Slasys' laser fire battered the shield, but didnt 
drain to 
> much power. The EMP canon released five silvery blasts swirling at 
high speed 
> towrds the jet.
>        "A joint attack heh?" Tarantulas says to himself in almost a 
chuckle. 
> "Let them try! This base will stop them all. The Iron Fist couldnt 
penetrate 
> this base." He sent word to Hell Beast of Zardus' plans.
> 
>        Nighteyes and Craken continue to monitor the frequency 
patterens and 
> radio traffic of the Black Fortress, and recive Zardus' 
transmission. "Looks 
> like Zardus has an agenda." She says, looking at Craken.
>        "Our base will hold itself well. Bots like Zardus can only 
send 
> obsticles. It is us who must over come them." He replied. His white 
eyes were 
> distant somehow.
